transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, aawaz aa rahi hai kya?
Executive: Haan ji sir aa rahi hai sir aawaz. Sir main ye bol rahi hu sir se meri aapse baat hui thi October mein theek hai Google meet ki thi hum logo ne aapke sare products se related. Sir maine aapse kaha tha ki sir aapke jo products ki jo images hai aur jo isme additional detailing hai wo to aap work kar lijiye usme to sir aapne bola tha ki main kar lunga isme. Sir main dekh rahi hu aap ek mahina images chahiye na. Reselling ki images nahi chahiye thi na.
Customer: Sir images to maine aapki sir usse website se nikal ke maine yaha pe upload ki thi sir aapne kaha di thi mujhe photo.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Maine photo bheju kya ye bola tha aapke aadmi ke kisi ko call aayi thi mujhe shayad unka naam Shekhar kuch to tha unka naam unko bheju kya bola tha sir wo mujhe bole the ki main apne yaha se photo lunga uski koi zarurat nahi hai aapke photo ki main website se leke bhej dunga mere pass abhi sabhi products ki photos hai maine sabhi nikal ke rakhi thi lekin wo bole ki website pe hum hum hamare aise photo dal denge edit karke.
Customer: Sir aapne mujhse to nahi bola tha kyuki agar mere se bola tha maine yaha pe uske baad bola tha na unhone form karke mujhe wo jo aapne team banai thi unka koi aadmi tha shayad.
Customer: Haan. Jo main hamari profile jo sambhal raha hai wo tha shayad wo.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Wo bol rahe the kaunsi to team team wo profile banati hai na hamara pehli baar. Wo jab aapke manager se ya kinse baat kari thi to unhone bola tha ki ye ye cheez hum aapke liye offer mein kar denge aur upar se ye sab team kaunsi hai aapki wo team ke name bole the wo aapke liye appoint karenge.
Executive: To phir us team mein se aadmi ko aadmi se maine bola tha ki un do images bhej do ya nahi. To wo mujhe bole the ki hum hamare yaha se images fill kar denge.
Customer: Sir images to sir jaise main dekhti hu yaha pe ek hi ek upload hai theek hai sare product mein ek do upload hai but maine aapko sir kuch aur bhi bola tha ki aapke jo product ki storing rating badhane ke liye sir buyers contact karne ke liye agar aapke pass koi video ya PDF ho na aap to zarur upload kar dijiye to sir aapne mujhse ye cheez boli thi ki videos to nahi hogi but ha mere product se related PDF agar kuch hongi to main yaha pe upload kar dunga to sir aapne wo bhi nahi kiya hai sir. Ab batao sir.
Executive: Suniye suniye abhi abhi kya kya requirement hai PDF aur photos.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Abhi kya kya lag raha hai profile update karne ke liye PDF aur photos na ya videos.
Customer: PDF aur photos photos aap upload kar do PDF ko agar aapke pass product se related wo zarur upload kar do.
Executive: Photos main direct aapko send karunga to aap waha pe upload kar denge na matlab.
Customer: Sir agar aap upload nahi agar sir aap upload kar pao na to ek baar aap kar do theek hai photos aaj upload kar do aaj photos aap sara cheez aaj kar do theek hai ki kal ek baar Google meet mein chat karke sir jo bhi aapki listing hai wo dekh lete hain theek hai sari cheez pe ek baar work kar lete hain kya kaisa hai aapki jo categories yaha pe add hai theek hai wo usme kya hai jaise ki aapki category yaha pe hai ye steel rivets yaha pe add hai jaise aise scope rivets die 4 into 6 6 mm wala jo product hai theek hai isme aapne category steel rivet karke diameter pe kuch hai nahi material pe kuch nahi maine to apne aap se dal diya tha ki aap all pe work kar rahe ho aur jo color waler hai wo as per requirement pe aap deal kar rahe ho maine apni taraf se dal diya tha theek hai.
Executive: Ek jo hum hamare se ek aadmi ne contact kiya tha wo kaun the?
Customer: Sir mujhe pata nahi hai mere pass to sir aisa kuch yaha pe update nahi hai lekin service team se hi hoga koi agar aapne call agar call aaya hoga catalog ya service team se hi hoga.
Executive: Jo profile hamare update kar rahe the na unka naam manager ke name se mail khata hai matlab unka dono ka name same hi hai aur wo unhone hame sab images aur wo sab hame contact kar rahe the ki ye kaunsa material ka hai ye hollow rivet kaunse material ka banate ho aur baad me wo baki cheez unko batai thi humne aisa nahi hai ki batai nahi hai lekin aapko hi pata wo kaun the aur kin kinone call ki thi.
Customer: Sir wo to sab dekhiye service team se hi koi banda hoga theek hai service team wale ne hi connect kiya hoga aapki sari cheeze but koi baat nahi.
Executive: Lekin ye bola hai humne aisa nahi hai ki bola nahi hai unhone sab update kar diya tha abhi pata nahi mere ko aur unhone mujhe bola tha manager kya manager ne humse ek saal ke liye hamara product matlab hamari company ka name agar koi bhi rivet ya kuch hamare product ke related search karega to IndiaMART mein first number pe show hoga.
Customer: Haan sir wo to hota hai first number pe show dekhiye aisi baat nahi hai ki first number pe show nahi hota aap pehle ye batao all India pe kar rahe ho kuch recommend mein kar rahe ho.
Executive: Kya kya?
Customer: All India pe deal kar rahe hain ki kuch recommend location pe bas kar rahe hain jaise.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi all India all India all India pe kar rahe hain na to sir all India mein jaise aap kar rahe ho deal theek hai abhi sir jaise main aapka ye solid rivet wala agar product yaha pe main click karti hu theek hai to aap hi ke area pe Maharashtra mein hi theek hai jaise aapko Maharashtra ka bhi main dekhu na to aap se bhi zyada high competitor mein chal raha hai aur sir unko aap hi ke sir Maharashtra mein achi khasi deal mil rahi hai to isiliye main aapko sir ye bol rahi hu ki sir pehle apne product pe work kar lo theek hai ek baar fir main aapko sari cheeze kal ek baar Google meet mein bata dungi dikha dungi kaise kya karna hai theek hai sir to kal sir agar time ho bataiye kis time pe Google meet mein connect kar le sir ek baar sir.
Customer: Mujhe ek ek karke bataiye kya kya requirement hai main sab ek ek karke sununga.
Customer: Dekhiye sir abhi suniye abhi aap sirf apne product mein photos dal dijiye photos jo bhi product se related PDF ho PDF dal dijiye itna kar dijiye aaj aap theek hai ki kal ek baar Google meet mein connect karke theek hai aap mujhe time bata do kis time pe connect karna hai main usi time pe aapko call karke connect karke sari cheeze aapki listing aur categories dikha dijiye theek hai aur apne competitors bhi main dikha dungi aapki screen pe ki aap hi ke is product pe work kar raha hai lekin unko kitna benefit mil raha hai kitne high mein chal rahe hain wo log.
Executive: Wo kitne mein competitor utar rahe hain matlab wo jo jinke baat aap kar rahe hain.
Customer: Dekhiye sir agar aapke pass number of inquiry zero aa rahi hai na to unke pass daily basis mein number of inquiry agar main month ka dekh rahi hu na to unke pass 100 70 inquiry calls aa rahi hai lead wo daily basis mein consume kar rahe hain sir.
Executive: Inquiry ki baat nahi kar raha hu main main unko bol raha hu ki unko customer jo jude hue hain wo unke pass se kitne amount of order le rahe hain matlab how much kitna order.
Customer: Dekhiye amount of order to unko hi pata hoga kitna le rahe hain par lekin mere pass jaise data main agar khol kar dekhti hu na jaise aapka main data khola theek lead mein aap zero inquiry calls mein zero hai aapne jo bhi customer ke reply aate hain usme zero hai call back mein zero hai theek hai to yahi main agar aapke hi competitor ko agar main dekh rahi hu na yaha pe theek hai ek minute polish aluminium ka theek to iski aap number of inquiry ye bhi Mumbai mein deal kar raha hai Maharashtra mein theek hai to iski.
Executive: Kya naam hai unka?
Customer: Rajesh Rivet Industry.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Haan to sir ye log bhi aap hi ke product aap hi ke tarah isi product pe deal kar rahe hain lekin inke aap number of inquiry dekho leads mein sir dekhiye pure saat din ke saat din active hai calls back mein inke pass jo aa rahi hai wo puri 70 hai theek reply ye log 50 ke upar kar raha hai inquiries jo hai wo 76% ke upar hai to kahi na kahi sir kuch na kuch difference hoga na to main aapko ek baar ye dikhana chahti hu ki kahi aapko ye na lag raha ho humne kuch kiya ho to kal ek baar Google meet mein connect karne ke liye main bol rahi hu to aap bata do ek time bata do main usi time pe bas aapko call karke connect karungi sir.
Executive: Mujhe bahut dino ke baad time mila hai aaj mujhe ek ek ghante mein aap kar sakte ho to mujhe chalega koi baat nahi hai lekin mujhe aaj sab complete kar dena hai process wo kyuki upar se bhi mujhe bahut bol rahe hain ki investment kiya hai lekin fayda to kuch nahi ho raha aap bol rahi hai theek hai sab.
Customer: Sir aapke liye ye baat main kar rahi hu aapke theek hai kal mere senior bhi rahenge usme theek hai seniors bhi dekhenge mere jo bhi hai isliye main aapse boli aap mera 9 se 6 rehta hai office 9 se 6 ke beech mein aap mujhe kabhi bhi bata do main usi time pe bas connect karungi sir 10 15 minute ka kam hai main aapse zyada time bhi nahi mang rahi ki aap mujhe aadha ghanta de do time.
Executive: Kya kya karne padega Google meet pe matlab nahi.
Customer: Sir aap Google meet mein connect bas kariyega main aapko pehle sari cheeze dikhaungi aapki listing aapke competitors aapko kitni number of inquiry calls aayi hai theek hai do mahine mein kitna kya work hua hai aapke listing mein uske baad aap mujhse boliyega ki ha Vanshika mam aapne sahi bola tha mere mein ye sari cheeze nahi hui hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi suniye na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Wo profile jo update karni hai usme ek PDF photos aur video chahiye na aapko.
Customer: Photos aur PDF bas update karni hai aapko har product mein.
Executive: Haan aur agar koi customer aage se call karega to wo call matlab hamare number pe aayegi ya pehle aap unse nahi nahi aapke hi number pe aayegi mere number pe kyu aayegi sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo puch raha hu main ki aap unse contact karte ho ya unke yaha se pehle matlab aap unse contact karke hamare bare mein bata batate ho ya un unko agar wo agar chahte ho to kabhi call aati hai.
Customer: Sir suniye hum nahi batate jab aap lead consume karoge na to aapki inquiry unke pass khud jayegi jab aap lead nahi consume karoge to aapke pass unke pass inquiries nahi jayengi aap samajh rahe ho ye sab lead consume karne se hota hai hum thodi na batayenge hamara to kam aapko lead provide karna jo hum denge aapko.
Executive: Ye bol rahe hain hum sir.
Executive: Matlab aap mujhe lead provide karenge aap aur phir hum decide karenge aisa bol rahe ho kya aap.
Customer: Haan sir hum lead aapko denge aap apne product se related leads dekhiye jo lead aapko lag raha hai ki mere relevant hai usko consume kariye ki jab wo lead consume karenge na tab aapke pass share ka option waha pe khul jata hai consume karne ke baad uske baad apne catalog ko aap buyers ko send karte ho uske baad buyer aapse connect hota hai aap samajh rahe hain aap.
Executive: Aap bhi ye baat kar rahe hain pehle to.
Customer: Sir main ye bol rahi hu jaise man lijiye aap.
Executive: Abhi mujhe samajh aa raha hai mujhe abhi samajh aaya aap kya bol rahe ho wo aap lead jo aapki yaha se jo leaders wo list hoti hai wo humko send karte ho phir hum wo choose karke wo unke yaha se phir unko pair kar aap pair karoge matlab phir.
Customer: Are sir list nahi send karte hain lead send karte hain sir aapko hum log.
Executive: Achcha. Haan sir kal aap pehle bataiye kis time pe Google meet mein connect karenge mujhe lag raha hai abhi aapko leads ka bhi thoda pata nahi hai main aapko leads bataungi kaisi hoti hai.
Executive: To kal kal bataiye sir lekin kal aap aaj to nahi ho payega sir possible kal hi ho payega hamara office band hone ka time ho gaya 6 baj gaya hai.
Executive: Kal kitne baje tak office khula hota hai aapka?
Customer: Sir hamara 9 se 6 rehta hai.
Executive: 5 5 baje.
Customer: 5 baje theek hai kal main aapko 5 baje karti hu pehle aapko sari cheeze main dikha dungi theek hai sir.
Executive: Haan haan haan theek hai. Theek hai aap hi ke number pe call karungi mera number save kar lijiye Vanshika naam se.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help with profile update.

- Customer wants to know about lead consumption.

- Customer wants to know about customer connect process.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to upload photos and PDF.

- Executive explained lead consumption process.

- Executive agreed to connect on Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Google Meet scheduled for the next day at 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile update, google meet, leads, pdf, photos
